name: Lab-Z: Escape from Madness
description:
Description:

Take a role as Orange Tan, a monkey with a background in martial arts -or- High Rabbit, a super smart rabbit to escape and try to survive from the lab experiment. Fight experimental animals as you venture in the forest. Level up your character, obtain skills and cards to strengthen your character. Combine and strategize your next move by using skills, cards, and environment.

Controls:

WASD : Move character

Space bar : Dash

Left click : Attack

Q : Active Skill 1

E : Active Skill 2

F : Interact

R : Use potion

Esc : Pause / Return

Credits:

Creative Lead: Yunita Winata • Dewi Anjani

2D Artist: Juventia Sabrina T. • Hannia Rachma • Agnes Margaretha L.

VFX Artist: Larry Lijuwardi • Tamara Ana • Shienny Jusuf

Audio Artist: Haryanto Sungkono
